title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - LSEG's migration & modernization journey: blueprint for cloud success (MAM206)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - LSEG的迁移与现代化之旅：云成功蓝图 (MAM206)
abstract: London Stock Exchange Group (LSEG) navigated significant hurdles in their digital transformation journey, including legacy processes, tight timelines, scalability issues, organizational silos, and operational friction. In this session, LSEG will reveal how they conquered these challenges to accelerate cloud value realization and maintain their competitive edge. Learn about their strategic architecture decisions, migration framework, and modernization approach that drove success. Discover how they developed end-to-end solutions to scale repeatable patterns, fostering a new cloud-fluent culture. Join us for firsthand insights into LSEG's transformation journey that you can apply to your own organization.
abstract_cn: 伦敦证券交易所集团(LSEG)在数字化转型过程中克服了重大障碍,包括遗留流程、紧迫的时间表、可扩展性问题、组织孤岛和运营摩擦。在本次会议中,LSEG将揭示他们如何战胜这些挑战,加速云价值实现并保持竞争优势。了解他们推动成功的战略架构决策、迁移框架和现代化方法。探索他们如何开发端到端解决方案以扩展可重复模式,培育新的云流畅文化。加入我们,获取LSEG转型之旅的第一手见解,您可以将其应用于自己的组织。
